page.title: 06CARAVAN SITE LOSSIEMOUTH
page.content:
The caravan site is situated in the North-East of this area beside the River Lossie. It is a municipal site, which can take twenty-eight static caravans and twelve tents. Next year it will be able to take double that amount because they are going to add more sinks and wash-hand basins. The facilities are:
Wash-hand basins Mens 7 Womens 6 Showers Mens 3 Womens 7 Toilets Men 8 Women 8 Washing machine 1 Tumble drier 1
The speed limit at the caravan site is 5 m.p.h. There are no traders allowed there.
